languages.text: Заняв должность коменданта столичного улья, она, пусть и не сразу, но примирилась с кузеном Махарием. Что, впрочем, было легко не заметить на собраниях столичной аристократии, где Иокаста и Махарий яростно грызлись при любой возможности.

She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.
languages.original_text: Заняв должность коменданта столичного улья, она, пусть и не сразу, но примирилась с кузеном Махарием. Что, впрочем, было легко не заметить на собраниях столичной аристократии, где Иокаста и Махарий яростно грызлись при любой возможности.

traits.locale_text: She took up the position of a hive warden on the capital world, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

languages.text: Sie nahm den Posten der Direktorin einer der Makropolen der Hauptwelt an und versöhnte sich nach einiger Zeit mit ihrem Vetter Macharius. Besagte Versöhnung war allerdings bei Treffen der feinen Gesellschaft leicht zu übersehen, da Jocasta und Macharius keine Gelegenheit ausließen, sich heftig zu streiten.
languages.original_text: She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

traits.locale_text: Sie nahm den Posten der Direktorin einer der Makropolen der Hauptwelt an und versöhnte sich nach einiger Zeit mit ihrem Vetter Macharius. Besagte Versöhnung war allerdings bei Treffen der feinen Gesellschaft leicht zu übersehen, da Jocasta und Macharius keine Gelegenheit ausließen, sich heftig zu streiten.

languages.text: Elle devint la gardienne de l'une des ruches du monde-capitale, et le temps aidant, elle finit par se réconcilier avec son cousin, même si leur rapprochement était tout sauf évident lors des rassemblements de la noblesse locale, où Jocasta et Macharius sautaient sur la moindre occasion de croiser le fer.
languages.original_text: She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

traits.locale_text: Elle devint la gardienne de l'une des ruches du monde-capitale, et le temps aidant, elle finit par se réconcilier avec son cousin, même si leur rapprochement était tout sauf évident lors des rassemblements de la noblesse locale, où Jocasta et Macharius sautaient sur la moindre occasion de croiser le fer.

languages.text: Ocupó el cargo de alguacil en una de las colmenas del mundo capital y se reconcilió con su primo Macharius, aunque tardaron en hablarse. La reconciliación pasó desapercibida en los encuentros de la nobleza del mundo capital, ya que Jocasta y Macharius no dejaban pasar ocasión de enzarzarse en feroces disputas.
languages.original_text: She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

traits.locale_text: Ocupó el cargo de alguacil en una de las colmenas del mundo capital y se reconcilió con su primo Macharius, aunque tardaron en hablarse. La reconciliación pasó desapercibida en los encuentros de la nobleza del mundo capital, ya que Jocasta y Macharius no dejaban pasar ocasión de enzarzarse en feroces disputas.

languages.text: 彼女は首都惑星のハイヴの監視者の職に就き、しばらくたってからのことではあるが、従兄弟のマカリウスと和解した。この和解は、いずれにしても、ジョカスタとマカリウスが激しい口論をする機会を逃さぬ首都惑星の貴族の集まりでは見過ごされがちなものだった。
languages.original_text: She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

traits.locale_text: 彼女は首都惑星のハイヴの監視者の職に就き、しばらくたってからのことではあるが、従兄弟のマカリウスと和解した。この和解は、いずれにしても、ジョカスタとマカリウスが激しい口論をする機会を逃さぬ首都惑星の貴族の集まりでは見過ごされがちなものだった。

languages.text: 她负责管理首都世界的其中一个巢都，还与她的堂兄马卡里乌斯和解了，不过和解只持续了一小段时间。毕竟，在首都世界的贵族聚会上，约卡斯塔和马卡里乌斯总是不会放过一切机会吵架，而他们之间的和解也总是被人忘记。
languages.original_text: She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.

traits.locale_text: 她负责管理首都世界的其中一个巢都，还与她的堂兄马卡里乌斯和解了，不过和解只持续了一小段时间。毕竟，在首都世界的贵族聚会上，约卡斯塔和马卡里乌斯总是不会放过一切机会吵架，而他们之间的和解也总是被人忘记。

languages.text: Başdünyadaki kovanlardan birinde dizdar olarak göreve başladı. Kuzeni Macharius ile arasını bir süre sonra olsa da düzeltmeyi başardı. Her hâlükârda başdünya soylularının davetlerinde uzlaşma sürecini göz ardı etmek kolaydır. Jocasta ve Macharius da bu davetlerde hararetli tartışmalara girme fırsatlarını hiç kaçırmadılar.
languages.original_text: She took up the position of the warden of one of the capital world's hives, and reconciled with her cousin Macharius, albeit only after a while. The reconciliation was, at any rate, easy to overlook during gatherings of capital-world nobility, where Jocasta and Macharius would waste no opportunity to have a ferocious row.
